clusteringStep

public double clusteringStep()
Do one step and return the overall stress (squared error). You should do this until the error is below a threshold or doesn't change a lot in between two subsequent steps.

Returns:

Re-shuffle all features.

getClusterOfFeature

public int getClusterOfFeature(Histogram f)
Used to find the cluster of a feature actually used in the clustering process (so it is known by the k-means class).

Parameters:
f - the feature to search for
Returns:
the index of the Cluster
